Articles.Content: When I press the brake button, the rover starts braking but as it reaches about 3.5 m/s, it jerks and suddenly stops to completely 0 m/s. It does that very suddenly and fyi- I have installed moar boosters update.

I guess that is some "feature" to keep the rovers from sliding all over the place when they are supposed to stand still. At some point the friction between the wheels and the ground gets increased. It probably needs some tweaking now after the changes that they introduced with the new version (1.8).

Is this an actual problem for you?
